fields.name: shader
fields.description: Shader - used to render pretty much everything

fields.name: font
fields.description: Battle popup font - used to draw damage numbers

fields.name: filterBlack
fields.description: Filter black - what shaders treat as black in source graphics, use rrr,ggg,bbb format

fields.name: filterDgray
fields.description: Filter dark gray - what shaders treat as dark gray in source graphics, use rrr,ggg,bbb format

fields.name: filterLgray
fields.description: Filter light gray - what shaders treat as light gray in source graphics, use rrr,ggg,bbb format

fields.name: filterWhite
fields.description: Filter white - what shaders treat as white in source graphics, use rrr,ggg,bbb format

fields.name: bgPalette
fields.description: Background palette - color mappings for the background level

fields.name: fgPalette
fields.description: Foreground palette - color mappings for moving sprites

fields.name: wipeShader
fields.description: Wipe shader - used for some screen transitions

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
